OrderPayment.TimerDescription: Please complete your payment within 24 hours, or your order will be automatically canceled
OrderPayment.OrderDescription: Please note: this purchase enrolls you in an auto-renewing subscription. One day before your current subscription period ends, it will be automatically renewed for a similar duration (we will notify you via email). You can disable auto-renewal at any time in your account settings or by contacting us at
OrderPayment.Help: Experiencing issues with your purchase? Reach out to us at
OrderPayment.SepaMandate: By providing your payment information and confirming this payment, you authorise (A) Careerum OU and Stripe, our payment service provider, to send instructions to your bank to debit your account and (B) your bank to debit your account in accordance with those instructions. As part of your rights, you are entitled to a refund from your bank under the terms and conditions of your agreement with your bank. A refund must be claimed within 8 weeks starting from the date on which your account was debited. Your rights are explained in a statement that you can obtain from your bank. You agree to receive notifications for future debits up to 2 days before they occur.

Tips.Tip1: You can cancel your subscription at any time
Tips.Tip2: Payment is made immediately for the selected number of months
Tips.Tip3: The subscription is renewed automatically at the same price and for the same period of time on the last day of the paid period
Tips.Tip4: Access to the club will open immediately â€” after payment you will receive an email with instructions

Validation.PromocodeDenied: The promo code cannot be used for this purchase

SBP.Title: Payment by QR code through the Fast Payment System
SBP.Step1: Point your phone camera at the QR code
SBP.Step2: The bank application selection will appear on the screen. Follow the instructions on your phone. If it doesn't work, go to step 3
SBP.Step3: Open the bank's app in your phone and go to the "Payments" section
SBP.Step4: Select "Payment by QR code" and scan the QR code
SBP.Step5: The order is formed within a minute after payment
SBP.PayError: An error occurred while trying to pay by SBP ðŸ˜¥

CareerumLoan.Title: Application for payment by installments from Careerum
CareerumLoan.DescriptionItem1Top: The first payment will be charged today from the selected card.
CareerumLoan.DescriptionItem1Bottom: Subsequent payments will follow your personalized schedule.
CareerumLoan.DescriptionItem2Top: We do not debit money without notice.
CareerumLoan.DescriptionItem2Bottom: A day before the payment is debited, we will send an email.
CareerumLoan.DescriptionItem3Top: This is not a loan or installment plan.
CareerumLoan.DescriptionItem3Bottom: Therefore, the application review is not associated with any bank.
